unnormalised: Thodkech, konnem-i Bharoti vostunche map somzoche vixim vicharle? Tem poromporik ani navin unit-anchem mixronn asta, zaka lagun dhondalpoddi zata. Tumkam “1 tsp” (chacho chamcho) holod dixtti podtta, vo “2 cups” basmati tandull. Kednam kednam resepi vostunchem voznn vapurta, zoxem "250 gm" paneer, punn anik kednam tem vollyum asta. "Chimutt" meet legit khub sadaronn asa, jem thumchem anguttha ani index finger modem dhorunk zata - sadharonponnan 1/8 tsp.
normalised: Hantunt, konnem tari Bharoti jevnachea resipeantlean mezpam somzonk sodlem? Tem poromporik ani adhunik mezpanchem ek misronn asta, zaka lagun bhonvdinn zaupak xokta. Tuka "ek chimut" haldi, vo "don kop" basmati tandull oxem dixtti poddttolem. Kednam kednam resipean वजन vapurtat, "don xembhor ani pon'nas gram" paneer sarkhem, punn anik khepe tem volum asta. "Eke chimti" mithui khub sadarann, jem tujo angth'tho ani torjonichi bott hanche madheant dhorunk zata - sadharonnon ek-oshttma chimti.

unnormalised: Eka vhoddli vostu yaad dovrunk zai ti "katori" map. Sadharonponnan, ek standart katori sumar 150-200 ml liquid vo sumar 100 g sukhi vostu dhorta. Punn yaad dovrat, katoricheo veg-veglleo size yetat, mhonnun tem sodanch ek sarkhem na! Sukhi vostun khatir, kednam kednam te "1/2 kg" vo "1 kg" vapurtat jem khub sovem asa. "1 tbsp" vo "2 tbsp" mhonnlear tablespoon, jem 3 chache chamcheak soman asa tem legit sadaronn dixtti poddtta.
normalised: Ek vhoddli vostu ugddas dovrunk zai ti mhollear "katori" mezop. Sadharonnon, ek pramanit katori sumara voir ek xembhor ani pon'nas te don xembhor militilitor udok vo sumar ek xembhor gram sukhi vostu dhorun dovorta. Punn kallzak dhor ki, katoriyo vegvegllea akaracheo astat, dekhun tem sodanch ek sarkhem asona! Sukhea vostun khatir, kednam kednam tankam "ardho kilogram" vo "ek kilogram" vapurtat jem khub sarol asta. Tem sadarann zaun "ek tablechonch" vo "don tablechonch" dekhunk melltta, jem tablechonch mhonnche tin chimti.

unnormalised: Mosale khatir, quantiti sumar lahan astaat. Tumkam “1/4 tsp” garam masala, vo “1/2 inch” all’lle dixtti poddtolem (tem lambai, vollyum nhoi!). Ani magir asa "to taste" (ruchichem promannar), mhonnlear tumkam tumchem svataxchem nyay vaprunk zai! Zori resepi "1/2 ltr" dhud dakoita, tem 500 ml dhudak translate zata. Kai lok "ml" direct unit mhonnun legit vapurtat.
normalised: Masaleank lagun, praman sadharonnon khub lhan astat. Tuka "ek choturthaim chimti" garam masalo, vo "ardho inch" allem (tem lambai asa, volum nhoi!). Ani magir "ruchik zai tem porimann" (ruchichim porimannanchem porimann), zaka orth asa tuka tujim svotanchim vichar vaprunk poddttolim! Zoxem resipean "ardho litor" dudh maglam, tachim porinnam ponch xembhor militilitor dudh. Thodde zann "militilitor" sid'dech mezop mhonn vapurtat.

unnormalised: Nimannem, jevonn korop mhonnlear feel ani ruchichem asa, mhonnun purai zogteponnan asche vixim chintunk naka. Dillele mapanchem suru korat, magir tumchea avddichem promannar bodol korat. Veli bhitor, tumi kitem tumkam chodd borem lagta tem borem zannam zatole. Yaad dovrat ki "1 gm" khub khub lhan asa, khaskeren tumi vhodd volyument astole vostunchi uloita asat tedna zoxe pistto vo tandull! Khuxalkayen jevonn korat!
normalised: Nimannek, jevonn koruncho orth mhonnche bodh ani ruch, dekhun tum poripurnn porimannak zaitinch chinta korunk favo na. Mezpan dillen hem zaituch puro asa, magir tuje khuxek favo tem porimann samball. Kallant, tuka tuka chodd borench kolltolem tuka kitem borem lagta tem. Ugddas dovortat "ek gram" khub khub lhan asa, khas korun tum vostunchea vishean uloitana zo vhodd volumant asta zoxem pith vo tandull! Borem jevonn korat!
